game.name: Onyx
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as Rowan, a secluded witch with a bad temper, in this intense adventure worth 30-40 hours of gameplay!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Rowan, a secluded witch with a bad temper, in this intense adventure worth 30-40 hours of gameplay!

reviewHighlights.text: On a whim, I picked up this cheap RPG that came out not even a week before writing this review. Now, I'm against the idea of people charging anything...
